/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The highway is teeming with vehicles, predominantly in shades of white, black, and gray, with a few splashes of red and blue adding vibrancy to the scene. The road itself is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. Above, the sky is a hazy gray, casting an overcast mood over the scene.
